ten_year_vision.identity_statement: A self-made millionaire with multiple businesses, deep relationships, and complete lifestyle freedom - living on my terms while helping others achieve the same.

life_domains.wealth: Financial independence with $5M+ net worth and $500k+ annual passive income
life_domains.relationships: Deep, meaningful connections with family, partner, and inner circle of high-performers
life_domains.impact: Mentoring 1000+ people to achieve their own self-mastery
life_domains.health: Peak physical and mental performance maintained into my 60s+
life_domains.lifestyle: Location-independent, time-rich, doing work I love with people I respect

non_negotiables: Family and close relationships are sacred

five_year_mission.primary_objective: Build a portfolio of 3 businesses generating $500k+ combined annual revenue with systems that run without me

supporting_missions.mission: Own 10+ cash-flowing rental properties generating $10k+/month passive income
supporting_missions.why: Real estate provides stable, leveraged wealth building and cash flow independence

supporting_missions.mission: Master enterprise sales with ability to close $100k+ deals consistently
supporting_missions.why: High-ticket sales skills fund all other ventures and compound over career

supporting_missions.mission: Launch and scale a productized service to $1M ARR
supporting_missions.why: Business equity is the fastest path to wealth and impact

supporting_missions.mission: Achieve unshakeable mental resilience and equanimity regardless of circumstances
supporting_missions.why: Inner peace is the foundation that makes external success sustainable

2026.key_question: What systems and skills must I build this year to enable everything else?

annual_objectives.objective: Launch productized service MVP and get 10 paying customers
Establish consistent 20+ hour deep work weeks
